summary: The Department of Homeland Security's (DHS) Office of Inspector General has faced work quality concerns, high leadership turnover, and more. This office is critical for ensuring independent and objective oversight of DHS. This statement provides preliminary observations from our work on the management and operations of this office. These include: The office has operated for 4 of the last 6 years without a strategic plan...
title: DHS Office of Inspector General: Preliminary Observations on Long-Standing Management and Operational Challenges
